Just to confirm all the previous comments, this game does in fact have this FADE thing active on it when you use the crack. It will cause you to have inaccurate aim and the phrase 'Illegal copies may degrade" will appear on screen during gameplay. This only happened when my computer was connected to the internet, and disappeared when I disconnected the internet, so maybe that has something to do with it.

However so far the game is still playable. Aim is inaccurate from far but up close shots can still hit targets. Plus I use my team mates to take out most of the enemies, I just like to give the orders and use stealth tactics. You can still drive and fly so the game isn't complete rubbish.

-UPDATE-

Ok, now the game has become rubbish. Now I know why they call it the FADE. During game play the screen becomes blurred and the picture begins to 'Fade' in and out of focus. Rendering the game unplayable. Uninstalled and moving on.......

Hi there,


Yes, I've managed to play Arma 2 And Arma 2 Arrow Head without suffering with FADE, if I am not 
mistaken. I did the following:

1. Installed Arma 2 without applying any 
crack or patch using this serial 61GJ-K7RGA-FLCYE-8M86T-SMPLH ;
2. Installed Arrow Head on the same 
directory of Arma 2 and, if I remember well, the installation program applyed a patch 
automaticaly, that's ok, still haven't crack yet using this serial 018J-097RH-LXEK6-DW98R-8M5B5;
3. After that applyed the patch 1.52 and 
haven't cracked yet;
4. Now, go to regedit and go here:
WINDOWS 7:  HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE - SOFTWARE - Wow6432Node - Bohemia Interactive Studio - ArmA 2 OA 
WINDOWS XP: almost the same way, but the Bohemia Interactive Studio it's under the  software and 
not WoW6432Node.
In the 
[url=https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/_zF1udWylRS4/TbTKs4Ibu2I/AAAAAAAAAD0/YgGK7iAQK10/s1280/Sem
%20t%C3%ADtulo.jpg]right panel will be 3 files[/url].
Right click on Arma 2 OA folder then left click it and select export and save it some where. Open 
it, the key file you just saved, with note pad and you will change the section "kEY"=hex etc etc 
etc TO "KEY"=hex:86,0f,39,40,26,aa,1d,e6,d4,ea,8d,2f,5c,e8,c8 and save it.
Don't go to Save As... but just Save and OK.
Now double click the file you edited and aply it.
5. Now go to [url=http://www.arma2.com/index.php?
option=com_rokdownloads&view=file&Itemid=20&id=511%3Aarma2oa-a-rft-patch-
1〈=en]Arma2.com[/url] and download the lastest patch and aply it.
6. Well, it was just it what I did over here. After the last patch, 1.59, I double clicked ARMA 2 
Combined Operations and the game booted up without any crack and no problens of FADE, CTD or 
anything. I actually playing the main campaign of Arma 2, did all the training and 
checked the scenarios missions.

Well now I am waiting for some "good" serial for Arma 2 Reinforcements to install it properly 
without triggering FADE. If you know something, please, tell me 

Good luck and sorry about my poor English.

Hi there,

For those who have a FADE problem, I simply went into my Firewall Advanced settings, and made an Inbound and Outbound rule who blocks Arma 2 server's IP, or whatever this IP those, and after that, I never had any FADE problem with Arma 2 and Arma OA. The only thing is that you won't be able to see any Arma 2 multiplayer servers, but I guess it isn't a problem eh? ;)

The IP is : 
From =>207.38.0.0 
           and 
To=>207.38.225.225

This applies for Inbound as well for Outbound rules. I know that if you allow the outbound but not the inbound, you'll be able to see multiplayer servers, but still won't be able to play.

Hope it helps!

I just downloaded it, apparently it's kind of fake, but not really fake.  It's the free version of the game, but unlike the actual full version, it just has multiplayer and map editing.  Also, it lacks HD graphics, a campaign, modding, or putting on addons.  

http://free.arma2.com/activation/index.jsp?nonce=ac496af4aa7ca9a6c2701cee584ee3279ec48e469d352918e0432946b7ebd96c

There is more details right there.  I would just stick with this torrent and not venture off anywhere else.  I only downloaded the free one because it was only a 15 minute download for me and I was curious.  When it started I noticed it was only a few MBs in size, so I figured this was just too good to be true (given that this torrent is almost 8 GiBs).

This torrent does work, if anyone says otherwise they are just simply inexperienced and got stuck.  If you are worried about how long it will take to download, just leave it on all night while you sleep or whenever you are at work.  That way, you'll have something else to look forward to.

Hope that helped :D
